name: breadcrumb-07
title: Breadcrumb with Icon and Label
description: A breadcrumb with icon and label component

files.content:
import { ChevronsRight, Component, Home, Route } from "lucide-react";
import {
  Breadcrumb,
  BreadcrumbItem,
  BreadcrumbLink,
  BreadcrumbList,
  BreadcrumbPage,
  BreadcrumbSeparator,
} from "@/registry/ui/breadcrumb";

const BreadcrumbsWithIconAndLabel = () => {
  return (
    <Breadcrumb>
      <BreadcrumbList>
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbLink href="#">
            <Home className="h-4 w-4" />
          </BreadcrumbLink>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbSeparator>
          <ChevronsRight />
        </BreadcrumbSeparator>
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbLink href="#/components">
            <Component className="mr-1 inline h-4 w-4" /> Components
          </BreadcrumbLink>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbSeparator>
          <ChevronsRight />
        </BreadcrumbSeparator>
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbPage>
            <Route className="mr-1 inline h-4 w-4" /> Breadcrumb
          </BreadcrumbPage>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
      </BreadcrumbList>
    </Breadcrumb>
  );
};

export default BreadcrumbsWithIconAndLabel;
